这是谷歌翻译的教程……看着不太对啊，开火键在哪里？？？
鼠标左键-射击
鼠标右键-瞄准

CTRL + V -火开关模式
CTRL + F -快速刀（刀）
这应该是添加纹理的教程了：Tutorial Outdated. There are some small changes. Instead of setting a weaponType directly set all attachments your gun may have.

To create the textures check out the following link. This is a texture helper I made for you:


Now if you installed "GunCus" and if you have started minecraft once, your /.minecraft/ directory should look more or less like this

Now go into the guns directory and modify the default configuration file there. Again: do whatever you want. But do not forget to set a texture! Also take care of the Bullet ID. Mine:

Now we have to create the textures. To understant how this system works check out the texture helper I mentioned above. The finished textures go now into the textures directory: 
Since 1.6.1 v1 the textures directory is no longer "/pack/textures", its "/pack/assets/minecraft/textures"!

The "/textures/bullets/" directory looks like this:
Since 1.6.2 you have to set the texture of bullets. For example the texture of this bullet would be "bullet_4".




snap20130513at195250.png (39.28 KB, 下载次数: 32)

下载附件

2013-10-4 20:49 上传





Additional informations:
- The IDs have to be between 257 and 32000
- You can create as much stuff as you want
- If 2 or more weapons need the same bullets: You dont have to create new bullets! 2 or more guns can use the same IDs!
- The bullet ID is not the same than the item ID. So you can set here whatever you want. Every pack has it's own bullet IDs so there wont be any conflicts between packs

To publish a pack just drag and drop the pack folder you created in the /.minecraft/GunCus/ directory into a new ZIP file. Make sure that you dont copy the hole GunCus folder and that you dont add other packs you didnt create into the ZIP file! Create a new topic in any forum and show the people the content. Also do not forget the download link!

Note: Do not use item IDs that are not available anymore.

纹理地址：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=1743712402&uk=3288951497
